channel.title: How Come in half-life 1 Gold$rc there are no circles in the game
channel.description:
I've played through the original at a very slow pace instead of my quicky pace I noticed that nothing is a circle but instead something like a 56 sided shape that makes the player think its circular. Only textures and buttons appear to have circles an those really dont look entirely circular
That is very odd that valve couldnt make circles in the game or is it even enemies arent circles the vorts heads are have alot of sides appearing circular but are not circles.

item.title: How Come in half-life 1 Gold$rc there are no circles in the game
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
If you’re talking about a true circle, it can be done with a 2D vector.

If you’re talking about a cylinder, then no

Read full topic

item.title: How Come in half-life 1 Gold$rc there are no circles in the game
item.dc:creator: Madcat1030
item.description:
It was that, or a wave. A FUCKIGN WAEV!

Regarding OP, the reason the buttons and shiz looked round(er) was cuz they were done has TECKSTCHERS! A techstcher is when one does have image on it.

But seriously, you should keep an eye out when playing other games. It definitely won’t be as obvious as it is in GldSrc (12 years old, now), but you’ll find that nowhere can you find a perfect circle or any perfect curve. It will always be a varying amount of straight edges.

Read full topic
item.source: How Come in half-life 1 Gold$rc there are no circles in the game

item.title: How Come in half-life 1 Gold$rc there are no circles in the game
item.dc:creator: Lord_Grievous
item.description:
Madcat1030:

[align=center]No
matter
how you
look at it, or
what is said, do not
let it get into your head.
Three sides, three corners, too,
triangles have the perfect do! Some
triangles look weirder than the rest, but
they all come from the same exact nest. No
matter how you look at it, or what is said, do not
let it get into your head. They are three cornered and
three sided, that is how all triangles can easily be sighted![/align]

What’s this, geometry for kindergarten

Read full topic

item.source: How Come in half-life 1 Gold$rc there are no circles in the game

item.title: How Come in half-life 1 Gold$rc there are no circles in the game
item.dc:creator: Madcat1030
item.description:
I wrote a concrete poem about triangles!

I’mma go find it nao… It’s been, like… four years…

[align=center]No
matter
how you
look at it, or
what is said, do not
let it get into your head.
Three sides, three corners, too,
triangles have the perfect do! Some
triangles look weirder than the rest, but
they all come from the same exact nest. No
matter how you look at it, or what is said, do not
let it get into your head. They are three cornered and
three sided, that is how all triangles can easily be sighted![/align]

That is the best thing I took out of 9th grade English. I’m surprised I still have it!

EDIT: Man! It rhymes less each year…

sersoft:

Kinda funny that the OP also didn’t notice the same trick used in every game. :retard:

Read full topic

item.source: How Come in half-life 1 Gold$rc there are no circles in the game

item.title: How Come in half-life 1 Gold$rc there are no circles in the game
item.dc:creator: dky.tehkingd.u
item.description:
To the OP… If you really don’t understand how computerized 3D geometry works, then… short and simple,

whenever you see a rounded object in ANY 3D Computer-generated image, it’s really THIS:

plus an image and a bunch of processing slapped onto it.

Half-Life 1 is pretty old, so it doesn’t like handling the large amounts of triangles used to draw “rounded” shapes, so it fakes it, so to speak.

Read full topic
